restaurants.name: amani fusion kitchen
restaurants.description: Dishes from all around Asia, especially famous for its Chicken Nanban and Singaporean chicken curry. Orange shop on the right hand side

restaurants.name: japanese curry
restaurants.description: Various rice bowls, with and without curry. Blue shop on the right hand side

restaurants.name: steak house
restaurants.description: Noodle or rice dishes that include steak and porkchop toppings. Served on hot plates. Green shop on the right hand side

restaurants.name: mediterranean
restaurants.description: Food from all over the Mediterranean, usually involves beef, pork or fish. Many of the dishes are gratined, making this one of the few places at campus you can get cheesy food. Served with rice or macaroni. Menu changes weekly. Located at the back of the cafeteria, right hand side

restaurants.name: noodles and dumplings
restaurants.description: Serving a large selection of noodle, dumpling and wonton dishes, this is the place to get your asian on

restaurants.name: buffet
restaurants.description: Provides a varied selection of meat, vegetables, fish and more. Perfect place if you're in the mood for everything. Price is based on weight. Located at the back of the cafeteria

restaurants.name: korean foods
restaurants.description: Your one and only place to get some real, solid bibimbap, kimchi hotpot and other Korean dishes. Located in the back of the cafeteria, on the left

restaurants.name: breakfast
restaurants.description: A popular place for a nice snack, each price includes a refreshing glass of milk tea

restaurants.name: taiwan food
restaurants.description: Chinese breakfast items and taiwanese cuisine combined for some real authentic, old school snacks and meals. Last shop on the left side

restaurants.name: orange rice place
restaurants.description: Rice with a large assortment of meats, and your free choice of vegetables from today's selection. Second to last shop on the left side

restaurants.name: yuloong noodles
restaurants.description: Noodles and soups, including the classic beef noodles. Located in the middle of the left side

restaurants.name: self serve
restaurants.description: Pick your own meal, freshly prepared in front of you. Also know as "That place with all the flames". Price depends on which ingredients and combos you want.

restaurants.name: tian sia life mall
restaurants.description: Noodles of all kinds, but what separates this shop from the others is the black pepper and bolognese versions.

restaurants.name: bakery
restaurants.description: Serves a selection of different cakes, breads, pastries, sandwiches as well as savory snacks reminiscent of pizzas and hot dogs. Selection changes often, so there is no set menu

restaurants.name: vegetarian buffet
restaurants.description: A wide range of delicious greens for when you don't feel like eating meat. Price varies

restaurants.name: steamed and fried dumplings
restaurants.description: EE cantina's #1 spot for dumplings, here you can also find cheap noodle dishes, wontons and comforting bowls of soup. Try

restaurants.name: general buffet
restaurants.description: Provides a varied selection of meat, vegetables, fish and more. Perfect place if you're in the mood for everything. Price is based on weight

restaurants.name: shallot pie
restaurants.description: Shallot pancakes with soy sauce, spicy sauce and pepper. A great snack for when you just need something for the road. Every dish comes with egg and a drink

restaurants.name: japanese food
restaurants.description: Rice, donburi, miso soup and omelet rice provides a taste of the land of the rising sun

restaurants.name: hot snacks
restaurants.description: Burgers, toasts, subs, and burritos. Also provides sets with milk tea and side dishes at a discount

restaurants.name: nice rice at a good price
restaurants.description: When all you need is some good old rice with meat and vegetables, this spot provides cheap and quick access to exactly what you need. Choose between small and large portions

restaurants.name: general buffet
restaurants.description: Provides a varied selection of meat, vegetables, fish and more. Perfect place if you're in the mood for everything. Price is based on weight.

restaurants.name: su hung restaurant
restaurants.description: The most famous honey chicken in town, there's a reason why the faculty have made this place their go-to.
